Class: KssBuilderHandlebars

kss/builder/handlebars~KssBuilderHandlebars

A kss-node builder that takes input files and builds a style guide using Handlebars templates.

Constructor

new KssBuilderHandlebars()

Create a builder object.

Source:
  • builder/handlebars/builder.js, line 43

Methods

prepare(styleGuide) → {Promise.<KssStyleGuide>}

Allow the builder to preform pre-build tasks or modify the KssStyleGuide object.

The method can be set by any KssBuilderBase sub-class to do any custom tasks after the KssStyleGuide object is created and before the HTML style guide is built.

The builder could also take this opportunity to do tasks like special handling of "custom" properties or running Sass or Bower tasks.

The parent class sets up access for this builder to an object containing the options of the requested build (as this.options), and the global Handlebars object (as this.Handlebars).

Parameters:
Name Type Description
styleGuide KssStyleGuide

The KSS style guide in object format.
Source:
  • builder/handlebars/builder.js, line 82
Returns:

A Promise object resolving to a KssStyleGuide object.

Type
Promise.<KssStyleGuide>
